scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a bearded man wearing a turban adorned with a floral ornament. He is dressed in a long robe with decorative trim and a cape. His left hand points downwards, while his right hand holds a staff or pointer, gesturing towards a circular object that appears to be a celestial sphere or astrolabe. The background is filled with stars and circular motifs, suggesting an astronomical or astrological theme. The overall style is that of a woodcut illustration, likely from a medieval or early Renaissance manuscript.
